replies.body:
#becauseillidanisagoodguy
Btw i feel we need a channeling mage like a warlock from wow. Sacrifice mobility while casting (not like xerath) for high burst dmg.
God we need a real Warlock champion that's not Annie :D

> [{quoted}](name=Tetreb1992,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iJzA3l7R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-22T18:55:52.583+0000)
>
> God we need a real Warlock champion that's not Annie :D

A warlock is subclass of mage who is mastered with black magic, in other says mage who uses his magical power for destruction.

Even though we don't have WoW type warlock who has similarity to witch doctors with primitive appereance, Xerath fits pretty well to definition of Warlock.
Ye but he doesn't have that warlockish feel :D
Historically, a warlock is a practitioner of witchcraft who has betrayed their coven, be they man or woman. The "dark spellcaster" thing is a construct of modern popular culture.

When I firstly saw him (low body, no head), I thought it was Death Knight Taric Skin lol. That muscled body.

I also can definitely see the similarity with Gul'Dan though. It would be even similar if Yorick kept his humpback. In video, he seems like he doesn't have.
To be fair he's undead. I'm fairly certain he could've fixed his back problems with the whole immense power of the Black Mist thing.
So that's why he has the misty cape
LOL, I thought the same thing about the humpback. Funny thing is, in the Shovel Teaser picture, he even looked like having one.
There's a distinct lack of fel and demonic influence here. IMPOSTER.

The glowing eyes.
The wizard's type nose.
The large frowning mouth.
Hidden face under massive hood.
The most generic villain beard.
The tragic visual seems to be gone.
The large thing on back weighing him down.
Glowing magic (blue instead of green) fire.

Yeah there's no doubt about it, Rito has made a Smurf Gul'dan.

IDK about any one else but I'm very interested to find out whether Yorick's pre transformation lived before Shadow Island creation or after.

Huh, looks like he got Taric'd.

I'll let the fans of the old champion determine if that's a good thing or not.  What are there, like 4 of them?
